title: nambinAl manamE
sahitya:
nambinAl manamE nI nalam uralAmE embirAn murugan iNaiyaDi tanaiyE


anupallavi

  ambikai umaiyALum ambalavANarum agamagizh pugazhODu tigazhvOnE


caraNam    aDuttaDutt-unnai keDuttiDum kETTinai taDuttATkoLLavum dayavinaik-kATTavum
eDutta narppaNiyai muDittiDavE tuNai koDuttiDavum kOri koDaivaLLavanai
